category: National Team Athletes’ Village Operation Regulations/Article 26 (Filming and Coverage)
contents: Article 26 (Photography and Coverage) ① Anyone who wishes to film or cover athletes’ village facilities and residents must submit an application form in attached Form No. 1 to the athlete’s village head. ② The athlete village head comprehensively reviews the conditions of the athlete village, the purpose of filming and reporting, and whether the subject consents, and notifies the applicant whether filming or reporting is approved. ③ The results of filming and reporting are prohibited from being used for commercial purposes.
